// actions.js
export var addPlayer=function addPlayer(player,team){return{type:'ADD_PLAYER',payload:{player:player,team:team}};};export var removePlayer=function removePlayer(playerIdToRemove,teamNumber){return{type:'REMOVE_PLAYER',payload:{playerIdToRemove:playerIdToRemove,teamNumber:teamNumber}};};export var updateTeamScore=function updateTeamScore(teamID,newScore){return{type:'UPDATE_TEAM_SCORE',payload:{teamID:teamID,newScore:newScore}};};
